summary: This FBI 302 document from January 18, 2011, details an attempt by FBI agents to interview Michael D. Friedman regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. Friedman refused to be interviewed, citing a non-disclosure agreement with his prior employer, Jeffrey Epstein. The document also notes that Alfredo Rodriguez is the subject of an obstruction of justice investigation.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Named in the document title as the subject of an obstruction of justice investigation, case ID 72-MM-113327.

persons.name: Michael D. Friedman
persons.context: FBI agents attempted to interview him on January 13, 2011, but he refused, citing a non-disclosure agreement signed with his prior employer, Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the prior employer of Michael D. Friedman, who cited a non-disclosure agreement with Epstein as the reason for refusing an FBI interview.

connections.description: Friedman was a prior employee of Jeffrey Epstein and cited a non-disclosure agreement with Epstein as the reason for refusing an FBI interview.
Rodriguez is under investigation for obstruction of justice in a case related to Jeffrey Epstein (case ID 72-MM-113327).

events.title: Attempted FBI interview of Michael D. Friedman
events.description: FBI Special Agents attempted to interview Michael D. Friedman at his residence regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. No one was home, but agents confirmed he was receiving mail there. When contacted by phone, Friedman refused the interview, citing a non-disclosure agreement with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Michael D. Friedman refused to be interviewed by the FBI on January 13, 2011, citing a non-disclosure agreement he signed with his prior employer, Jeffrey Epstein.
Alfredo Rodriguez is under investigation for obstruction of justice in case 72-MM-113327, which is related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The document indicates an active FBI investigation into Epstein-related matters as of January 2011, with attempts to interview associates.
